DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe safety immunogenicity repeat administration Adacel vaccine approximately 10 year follow initial administration vaccine . Antibody level prior revaccination also use characterize antibody persistence follow initial vaccination 10 year earlier . Primary Objectives : - To compare seroprotection rate tetanus diphtheria induced Adacel vaccine induce Td Adsorbed vaccine . - To compare booster response rate tetanus diphtheria induced Adacel vaccine induce Td Adsorbed vaccine . - To compare anti-pertussis geometric mean antibody concentration ( GMCs ) induce Adacel vaccine GMCs induce Daptacel® vaccine give infant . Secondary Objectives : - To describe rate immediate reaction , solicit reaction , unsolicited adverse event ( AEs ) , serious adverse event ( SAEs ) follow vaccination Adacel Td Adsorbed vaccine . - To describe booster response rate pertussis antigens follow revaccination Adacel vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Adults Revaccination With Adacel® Vaccine 10 Years After Previous Dose
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy adult < 65 year age receive Adacel vaccine 10 year previously randomize receive either Adacel TENIVAC ( Td Adsorbed ) vaccine . They assess immunogenicity baseline post-vaccination . Safety data collect 6 month follow vaccination .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subject ≥ 18 < 65 year age time vaccination . Received Adacel vaccine less 9 11 year previously . Informed consent form sign date . Subject able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure . Exclusion criterion : Subject pregnant , lactating , child bear potential without use effective method contraception practice abstinence least 4 week prior vaccination least 4 week vaccination . Females premenarche postmenopausal least one year , surgically sterile exclude . Any condition , opinion Investigator , would pose health risk participant interfere evaluation vaccine . Chronic illness , opinion Investigator , stage might interfere trial conduct completion . Known suspected congenital acquire immunodeficiency ; receipt immunosuppressive therapy anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 6 month ; longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy ( prednisone equivalent 2 consecutive week within past 3 month ) . Known suspected receipt tetanus toxoid ( T ) , tetanus diphtheria toxoid ( Td ) , tetanus diphtheria toxoid acellular pertussis ( Tdap ) vaccine since receipt qualify dose Adacel vaccine describe Inclusion Criterion # 2 . A personal history physiciandiagnosed laboratoryconfirmed pertussis disease within last 10 year . A previous severe reaction pertussis , diphtheria tetanus vaccine include immediate anaphylaxis , encephalopathy within 7 day seizure within 3 day receive vaccine . Receipt immune globulin , blood bloodderived product past 3 month . Suspected known hypersensitivity vaccine component , history lifethreatening reaction vaccine use trial vaccine contain substance . Receipt vaccine within 30 day receive study vaccine , plan receive another vaccine 2nd visit ; except influenza vaccine may receive 30 15 day ( less 15 day ) receive study vaccine . Participation another interventional clinical trial investigate vaccine , drug , medical device , medical procedure 30 day precede first study vaccination course study , discretion Sponsor . Seropositivity Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , report subject . Laboratoryconfirmed thrombocytopenia , may contraindication IM vaccination , discretion Investigator . Bleeding disorder receipt anticoagulants 3 week precede inclusion , may contraindication intramuscular ( IM ) vaccination , discretion Investigator . Personal history GuillainBarré syndrome . Moderate severe acute illness/infection ( accord Investigator judgment ) febrile illness ( temperature ≥ 38.0°C [ ≥ 100.4°F ] ) day vaccination . A prospective subject enrol study condition resolve febrile event subside .
